name: Cut Candy (Free)
description:
Had enough of slicing games? Boost up your fun with Cut Candy! Slice as fast as you can to earn highest score and blow the game away.
====================================
Greedy Mini is eating up all the food! Look~ these junk foods are her favorite.
Even though she is tiny! But you will never know that she can eat a cow~
Let’s slice some food to feed her! Knowing what Mini like and begin...
====================================
NEW USER EXPERIENCE
Never play “slicing food” before? Not a problem!
Our tutorial will walk you through the basics to get you ready for all the action in time.

Guild:
- Avoid the worm to complete the task.
- Please be careful these moving worms.
- Slash till you reach red arrow!
====================================
Use tools to experience different way in playing!
Re-mastered sound and graphics!
There are 4 Themes in100 levels.
Submit your best score to Game Center to compete with other players online.
